text: ninre raksitav malakkukalkk beadhanam nalkiyirunna sandarbham (orkkuka.) nan ninnalute kuteyunt‌. atinal satyavisvasikale ninnal urappiccu nirttuka. satyanisedhikalute manas'sukalil nan bhayam ittukeatukkunnatan‌. atinal kaluttukalkk mite ninnal vettikkealluka. avarute viralukalellam ninnal vettikkalayukayum ceyyuka
